channel.title: R on HealthHeroes
channel.description: Recent content in R on HealthHeroes

item.title: Proposal
item.description: Motivation There is presently no application that employs geospatial analysis techniques such as buffering or raster density maps to access the availability of health-advocating amenities from all the three main aspects as mentioned above. Our application will provide an easy to understand and user-friendly GUI, but will also contain a degree of technical depth such that urban planners can identify and resolve any potential lapses or areas of improvement.
